DOC.brief_title: Comparative Effect Chewing Sticks Toothbrushing Plaque Removal Gingival Health
DOC.detailed_description: Dental plaque removal essential maintain oral health . Methods oral hygiene vary country country culture culture . The use wood stick ( miswak chew stick ) brushing teeth consider important tool oral hygiene care many Afro-Asian community . The aim study compare effect chew stick ( miswak ) , toothbrushing plaque removal gingival health . The participant comprise 18 healthy Saudi Arabian male volunteer age 21 30 year , Taibah University Saudi Arabia . The study design single , blind , randomize split-mouth study . Professional tooth cleaning conduct , six week use either miswak toothbrush quadrant , modify plaque gingival index , record .
DOC.criteria: Healthy individual presence least 14 teeth Subjects medication ( antiinflammatory antibiotic )
